txt.en: If You Want to Make A Hearty Egg Breakfast...
Drake eggs can be found throughout Borkordh, on the south-east side of the Pit of Stonejaws.

'It is as I always say, [placeholder]: if you want dwarves to live long, satisfying lives full of hearty breakfasts of eggs and bacon, you can't be afraid of a few drakes.\n\n'Something like that, anyway. Well-done, my adventuring friend.'
Molkha is scouting outside the drake-nest of Borkordh in the south-east corner of the Pit of Stonejaws.

'There are a lot of unhatched eggs down there in Borkordh, and I think it will be best if we keep them that way! Drakes grow up fearsome and dangerous, and their favourite breakfast is unwary dwarf!\n\n'I enjoy eggs for breakfast, myself. But I won't be eating these, [placeholder], absolutely not! Go break the drake-eggs and make the Pit of Stonejaws safer for the Gabil'akk√¢.'
Molkha believes you should break as many unhatched drake eggs in Borkordh as you can.
